Subject: Fan Reaction
Hello Boss,
Our fans aren't really happy about the loss of Ivan Calderon.
The overall fan interest decreases slightly.

Sincerly,
Your PR Director

Date: Monday, 5/1/1991
Subject: Status of Dave Eiland
Dear Sir,
Dave Eiland has an ERA of 6.89 at AA Arkansas Travelers.
I believe he isn't ready yet for that level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 5/1/1991
Subject: Status of Damion Easley
Dear Sir,
Damion Easley has an AVG of .179 at AA Arkansas Travelers!
That's definitely no good sign. I suggest demoting him soon.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 5/1/1991

He has an ERA of 1.52, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director
